snippet.title: 5050 - PC Gameplay (Steam)
snippet.description:
5050 is a simple game of chance. Are you feeling lucky? Insert some points and press the button. They’ll either get doubled or turn to nothing. Your objective is simply to accumulate as many points as possible.

It’s up to you how cautious you want to play, but it’s high risk reward. Points in your account are safe, but what fun is safety without progress? With only 2 controls, you must play this game on instinct alone.

The game is won once you reach 1 million points, and your progress towards this is shown at the bottom of the screen. You can of course keep playing even after surpassing this goal.

Developed by Follow the fun

#5050 #theforeseenarcade #steam #steamgames #steamgame
